articles.author: Press Trust of India
articles.title: Pakistan Cricket Board Refuses To Play ODI Series In Sri Lanka After SLC's Proposal to Host Asia Cup.. - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Relations between the PCB and Sri Lanka Cricket (SLC) have turned sour after its offer of hosting the entire Asia Cup instead of four games being held in Pakistan as per the 'Hybrid Model' proposed by Najam Sethi, according to a PTI report
articles.content: The Pakistan Cricket Board (PCB) is upset at Sri Lankan board expressing its desire to host the entire Asia Cup and has declined the latter's offer to play an ODI bilateral series in the island natio… [+2269 chars]
